"The ARKS Bingo Card":
"This will explain the 'ARKS Bingo Card'.

If you complete the objectives on the ARKS Bingo Card, you will get rewards corresponding to the number of Bingos you achieved.

You can check out the objectives by selecting 'ARKS Bingo Card' and choosing 'Check Details'."

"If you do not set up your ARKS Bingo Card in advance, you will not be rewarded for completing its objectives.

Do not forget to choose 'Use this Bingo Card' after you check its contents."
"After you set it up, you will automatically be rewarded for completing objectives. Do your best to complete them."
